Please follow the instructions below to: Tsweetswee latela ditaelo tse di tlase go phatlalatsa faele ya gago.
Download the sample file first and add a: Khoasolla faele ya mohlala pele mme o tsenye tsotlhe dikai tsa gago mo go yona.
Indicates a required field. If you do no: E bontsha lefelo le le tlhokegang. Fa o sa tsene mafelo a a tlhokegang, tsamaiso e tla akanya sehlahisoa e le sa botlhokwa.
After adding all your products, please s: Morago ga go tsenya tsotlhe dikai tsa gago, tsweetswee boloka faele mme morago o phatlalatse mofuta o o tokafaditsweng.
The name of the product you are adding (: Leina la sehlahisoa se o se tsenyang (seno: "Banana").
The category under which the product fal: Sehlopha se se leng fa tlase ga sehlahisoa (seno: Diphologolo, Diteknoloji).
If the system does not find this, it wil: Fa tsamaiso e sa kgone go bona seno, e tla iketla ya dira se se sefsa.
The measurement unit used for the produc: Yuniti ya tekanyo e e diriswang mo sehlahisoa (seno: Karolo, Kg, Litre, Lebokoso).
The brand or manufacturer associated wit: Setlogo kgotsa moetsi yo o amanang le sehlahisoa (seno: Samsung, Nestlé).
The available quantity of the product cu: Palo ya sehlahisoa e e leng teng mo invontoring jaana.
A unique code for the product, often use: Khoutu e e ikgethileng ya sehlahisoa, e e dirisiwang gongwe mo barcode kgotsa go batla ka bonya.
Product codes must be unique. If a code: Dikhowto tsa sehlahisoa di tshwanetse go nna di le bošwa. Fa khoutu e setse e dirisiwe mme o tsenya khoutu e e sa bošweng mo faeleng, tsamaiso e tla tlhofofa sehlahisoa seo.
The cost price of the product without in: Thekgo ya sehlahisoa ntle le gore VAT e tsenywe mo go yone.
Maximum Retail Price — the highest price: Palo e e kwa godimo ya thekiso ya mo mabenkeleng — thekgo e e godimo e e letsegwang go rekisa sehlahisoa mo bathong.
Special discounted price for resellers o: Thekgo e e kgethegileng ya di-discount bakeng sa ba-reseller kgotsa ba-dealer ba ba rekang ka bongata jo bo kwa godimo.
The price offered for bulk purchases, ty: Palo e e bontshiwang bakeng sa di-purchase tse di bokete, gantshi e e kwa tlase ga MRP.
The name of the VAT (Value Added Tax) ap: Leina la VAT (Value Added Tax) e e dirisiwago mo seproduktong.
If the system does not find an existing: Fa tsamaiso e sa fitlhe mo go tlhopho ya VAT e e leng teng, e tla ikatisetsa e potlakileng mme e tlhomamise sekai go ya ka boleng jwa VAT (%) jo o bo fileng mo kolomong.
The percentage of VAT (Value Added Tax): Phatlhopho ya VAT (%) e e dirisiwago mo seproduktong.
Whether the VAT is added on top of the p: Gore VAT e tsenngwa godimo ga thekgo (exclusive) kgotsa gore e setse e tsentse mo thekong (inclusive).
The quantity threshold to alert when sto: Mmaraka wa palo ya se dikitso gore go lemosege fa stock e le tlase (ka sekai, fa stock e wela tlase ga dikarolo tse 10).
The name of the company or entity that p: Leina la khampani kgotsa mokgatlho o o tswang sehlahisoa.
The expiry date for the product, useful: Letsatsi la go fella la sehlahisoa, le le molemo thata mo diphethong tse di nang le nako e e lekanyeditsweng.
After adding all your parties, please sa: Morago ga go oketsa dipato tsotlhe tsa gago, tsenya faele mo seemong mme morago o e upload-a mofuta o o ntšhwetseng.
Enter the official name of the party you: Tlatsa leina la semmuso la parteo eo o e oketsang.
Select the type of party. (For Customers: Kgetha mofuta wa parteo. (Bakeng sa Bareki: Retailer / Wholesaler / Dealer; Bakeng sa Mofani: Mofani)
Enter the phone number of the party (opt: Ikobelela nomoro ya mogala ya parteo (kgethegile).
Enter a valid email address for the part: Ikobelela aterese ya imeile e e maleba ya parteo (kgethegile).
Enter the due amount for this party (opt: Ikobelela boleng jo bo ntseng jang for parteo e (kgethegile).

View and update currency settings: Bona le ntšha ditlhophiso tsa madi
Configure the fundamental information of: Beakanya tshedimosetso ya motheo ya sebaka.
Control and configure overall notificati: Laola le beakanya ditsamaiso tsa tse di itseng tsotlhe tsa tse di lemogang
Laola tsela ya tefo ya go reka.
